{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Buffalo |model=WAPM-HP-AM54G54 |revision= |availability=not in the US |type=access point |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4704 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=2 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |serial=DIN |jtag= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=a |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if=Mini PCI |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=ADMtek |sw_model=ADM6996M |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags=high power |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ch= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }}[http://buffalo.jp/products/catalog/item/w/wapm-hp-am54g54/ Product page (JP)]
The hardware may be the same as the WAPS-HP-AM54G54 ([http://www.anywlan.com/thread-103179-1-1.html internal photos]).
